service.title: Resource Digests for HTTP
service.documentation: This document defines the Digest and Want-Digest header fields for HTTP, thus allowing client and server to negotiate an integrity checksum of the exchanged resource representation data.

http-header.documentation: The Want-Digest message header field indicates the sender's desire to receive a representation digest on messages associated with the Request-URI and representation metadata.
The Digest header field provides a digest of the representation data.
